answers.answer: I WAS TAKING 5MG PERKS FOR SCIATICA WHILE I WAS PREGNANT, AND I WAS PROBABLY TAKING AT LEAST TWO MORE THAN  I WAS SUPPOSED TO.  I DID THAT FROM ABOUT 5 MONTHS TO 8 MONTHS.  I ALSO TOOK IT IN THE BEGINNING FOR A CORPUS LUTEUM CYST ON MY OVARY.  MY DAUGHTER WAS BORN AT 38 MONTHS AND 4 DAYS AT 7LBS 15 OZ, HEALTHY AS CAN BE.  THEY TOLD ME THAT IT WAS OKAY TO TAKE IT AS LONG AS YOU DID AS IT WAS PRESCRIBED.  LIKE I SAID THOUGH I DID TAKE MORE THAN I WAS SUPPOSED TO.  HOW MANY ARE YOU TAKING??  HOW FAR ALONG ARE YOU??  I WOULD TRY TO CUT DOWN ON HOW MANY YOU ARE TAKING IF IT IS ALOT.  ARE YOU TAKING IT RECREATIONALLY OR FOR A PHYSICAL CONDITION?  I REGRET DOING IT, BUT AM VERY LUCKY THAT MY BABY TURNED OUT JUST FINE.  THE ONLY PROBLEM I HAD WHILE I WAS PREGNANT WAS HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE.  I DO KNOW THOUGH THAT SOME BABIES CAN BE SERIOUSLY AFFECTED BY DRUG ABUSE.  I'VE ALSO READ THAT COCAINE, IN THE EARLY STAGES OF PREGNANCY CAN KILL THE BABY.  JUST A LITTLE EXTRA INFO...

I also took vic's while pregnant...but they were rx'd and my use was minimal. Before I found out I was pregnant I was using...but stopped right away (had no idea there were wds and didn't have any....my use wasn't that much) but as the pregnancy went on the pain got harder and harder on my back. My son was born early and in NICU for 8 days... this was ONLY because of my preeclampsia.... The dr and I did not feel it had anything to do w/the use of the pain meds.Please not just for your sake but your babies sake.... get clean... you don't want to be hooked on pills.... I realized after watching my son's 1st Bday party video the next day that I didn't even remember have the stuff I said or did b/c I was so loaded on pills. Please don't be like me.... Don't get me wrong he has always been cared for and spoiled rotten.... but I hate that feeling that I don't remember stuff.Keep posting...you will find lots of friends and support here!JoAnn
